title: Where can I upload a 20 minute video? - Quora

response.answer_text: Where can I upload a 20 minute video? Obviously, YouTube is the best choice. First create a YouTube. Sign in to YouTube on a computer.Try any action that requires a channel, such as uploading a video, posting a comment, or creating a playlist.If you don't yet have a channel, you'll see a prompt to create a channel.Check the details and confirm to create your new channel.Then verify your YouTube account, then you can upload your 20mins video on YouTube, and share it anywhere.

Well, you can upload this amount of data to almost any cloud storage service. I can name a few: DropboxOneDriveFilewhopperGoogle DriveWetransferYou can’t upload it via email or messengers, though as they are not made for this task. Regularly, you can attach to the email no more than 25MB and messengers can hardly transfer 50MB.
